TunableList.name: ROUTING_SLAVE_ENTRY_STATE
TunableList.description: Possible states to set on the routing slave on entry. The state is set if its tuned tests pass. The first state with tests that pass will be set.

Tunable.name: Routing Slave Entry State
Tunable.description: The state that the routing slave will be put into when their owner is hidden.

TdescFragTag.name: value
TdescFragTag.description: The result of the tests determines if this state is set.

TunableList.name: ROUTING_SLAVE_EXIT_STATE
TunableList.description: Possible states to set on the routing slave on entry. The state is set if its tuned tests pass. The first state with tests that pass will be set.

Tunable.name: Routing Slave Exit State
Tunable.description: The state that the routing slave will be put into when their owner is unhidden.

TdescFragTag.name: value
TdescFragTag.description: The result of the tests determines if this state is set.
